src:
【直播預告】川普11.4將參加肯塔基州助選集會（中文同聲翻譯）

01 Nov 2019, 23:15

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月02日訊】美國總統川普11月4日將參加肯塔基州列克星敦魯普體育館（Lexington Rupp Arena）的競選集會，為肯塔基州長馬特·貝文（Matt Bevin）的連任助陣。新唐人電視台和《大紀元時報》將進行全程追蹤和網絡直播，並有同聲翻譯。請鎖定新聞直播間。
據WBKO報導，魯普體育館將於11月4日下午4點開放。 「讓美國繼續偉大」（Keep America Great）集會從傍晚7點開始。官方尚未發布集會議程，但據一份新聞稿，川普期待與肯塔基州人分享他的成就。
貝文正與州檢察長、民主黨候選人安迪·比希爾（Andy Beshear）進行激烈的競爭。
川普曾推文盛讚州長貝文。川普說，貝文為肯塔基人民做的非常棒！貝文繼續保護著你們非常重要的第二修正案。「他在犯罪和邊境問題上都很強勢，他熱愛我們偉大的老兵和軍隊。他擁有我的完全和全面的支持，並且一直都有！」
川普最近一次訪問肯塔基州是在兩個月前，當時他在路易斯維爾舉行的第75屆AMVETS全國代表大會上發表講話。
預計副總統邁克·彭斯（Mike Pence）也將在大選之前對肯塔基州進行訪問。
大紀元和新唐人網絡直播時間：美東時間：11月4日（週一）晚20:00開始（中港台時間：11月5日早9:00開始）
網絡收看方式：新唐人網站：https://www.ntdtv.com大紀元網站：https://www.epochtimes.com/b5/nf1334917.htm新唐人臉書直播：facebook.com/NTDCHINESE新唐人YouTube直播：youtube.com/user/NTDCHINESE大紀元臉書直播：facebook.com/djy.news大紀元時報-台灣臉書直播：facebook.com/epochtimes.taiwan大紀元新聞頻道：https://www.youtube.com/c/djynews
（責任編輯：李紅）
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/01/a102698416.html
text:
[Live preview] Trump 11.4 will participate in the Kentucky Assistant Selection Conference (Chinese simultaneous translation)

01 Nov 2019, 23:15

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 02, 2019] US President Trump will participate in the campaign rally of Lexington Rupp Arena in Kentucky on November 4th, for Kentucky Governor Matt Bevin. Re-election to help. NTDTV and the Epoch Times will conduct a full-time tracking and webcast, and have simultaneous translations. Please lock the news live room.
According to WBKO, the Rupp Arena will open at 4 pm on November 4. The Keep America Great rally starts at 7 o'clock in the evening. The official has not yet released the assembly agenda, but according to a press release, Trump is looking forward to sharing his achievements with Kentucky people.
Bevan is in fierce competition with the state attorney general and Democratic candidate Andy Beshear.
Trump had a tweet to praise Governor Beven. Trump said that Bevan did a great job for the Kentucky people! Bevan continues to protect your very important Second Amendment. "He is very strong on crime and border issues. He loves our great veterans and the army. He has my complete and comprehensive support and always has it!"
Trump's last visit to Kentucky was two months ago when he delivered a speech at the 75th AMVETS National Congress in Louisville.
Vice President Mike Pence is also expected to visit Kentucky before the election.
Epoch Times and NTDTV Live Time: US East Time: 20:00 on Monday, November 4 (Monday, Hong Kong and Taiwan Time: 9:00 am on November 5)
Online viewing: NTD website: https://www.ntdtv.com Epoch Times website: https://www.epochtimes.com/b5/nf1334917.htm New Tang Dynasty Facebook Live: facebook.com/NTDCHINESE NTDTV Live: youtube .com/user/NTDCHINESE Epoch Times Facebook: facebook.com/djy.news Epoch Times - Taiwan Facebook Live: facebook.com/epochtimes.taiwan Epoch Times News Channel: https://www.youtube.com/ c/djynews
(Editor: Li Hong)
